Undead Zealot are zombies that have a 5% chance to spawn[1] when a player opens any chest in the Shade Catacombs. Only the player who opens the chest to spawn them will be able to attack them.

They will always drop bleached bones, which are used on the Altar of the Damned to recharge a player's prayer points to full like a regular altar.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 Tertiary
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 Trivia
  • 4 References

Drops[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bleached bones1AlwaysNot sold0

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Zombie champion scroll11/5,000[d 1]Not sold0
  1. ^ Zombie champion scrolls are only dropped if Champions guild is unlocked and player hasn't already defeated the Zombie champion.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

The Undead Zealot in Mort'ton has more cosmetic variation.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Despite being in a single combat area, if multiple of these enemies are spawned by one player at once, they can all attack at the same time.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 4 April 2021. (Archived from the original on 6 April 2021.) Mod Ash: "[Any chance you could tell us the odds of spawning an Undead Zealot when opening chests in the Catacombs?] 1/20"

'''Undead Zealot''' are zombies that have a 5% chance to spawn{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1378739275613794304|date=4 April 2021|archiveurl=https://archive.ph/ss25B|archivedate=6 April 2021|quote=[Any chance you could tell us the odds of spawning an Undead Zealot when opening chests in the Catacombs?] 1/20}} when a player opens any chest in the [[Shade Catacombs]]. Only the player who opens the chest to spawn them will be able to attack them.

They will always drop [[bleached bones]], which are used on the [[Altar of the Damned]] to recharge a player's prayer points to full like a regular altar.

==Trivia==
* Despite being in a single combat area, if multiple of these enemies are spawned by one player at once, they can all attack at the same time.
